head.title: Business Template | Fran Aragón
head.description: Professional business website template created by Fran Aragón. Built with React and TypeScript, it provides an elegant, responsive experience optimized to showcase services, values, team, gallery, and contact in an intuitive and appealing way.

cookies.message: We use analytical cookies to improve the user experience and analyze site traffic. We do not store personal data. You can accept or reject their use.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This website uses analytical cookies to understand how users interact with the site, using tools such as Google Analytics and Search Console.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small files stored on your device to improve your experience on the website.
typesList: Analytical cookies: Allow us to collect anonymous data about site usage to improve performance and user experience.
cookiesPolicy.manageText: You can accept or reject analytical cookies via the banner or through your browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.personalDataTextPart1: We do not collect or store personal data through cookies or forms on this site.
cookiesPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy occasionally. Please review this page to stay informed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This website does not store personal user data. We only use external tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to analyze metrics and improve the experience.

sections.title: 1. Personal data
sections.text: We do not collect or store personal data through this website.

sections.title: 2. Analytical tools
sections.text: We use Google Analytics and Search Console to measure site traffic and behavior, always respecting user privacy through data anonymization.

sections.title: 3. Contact
sections.text: If you want to contact me, you can do so by email. We do not store your information or track you.

sections.title: 4. Rights
sections.text: Since we do not store personal data, requests for access, correction, or deletion do not apply.

sections.title: 5. Policy changes
sections.text: We may update this policy at any time. We recommend reviewing it periodically.

footer.slogan: Providing professional solutions to grow your business and achieve your goals.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.error: There was an error sending the message

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.subtitle: Discover our story, values, and commitment to excellence
about-us.story: Our company was born from a passion for delivering professional solutions and a total commitment to our clients. From the very beginning, we have aimed to provide services that combine experience, innovation, and quality in every project.
about-us.journey: Over the years, we have grown thanks to the trust of our clients and the constant dedication of our team. Each project reflects our strategic approach, attention to detail, and commitment to excellence.
about-us.mission: We provide reliable, high-quality services designed to help our clients achieve their goals. Our mission is to empower businesses with efficient, customized solutions.
about-us.vision: We strive to be a leading reference in our industry, combining innovation, professionalism, and approachability, creating a positive impact on every client and project we undertake.
about-us.qualityText: Excellence in every service and product.
about-us.innovationText: We constantly seek new ideas and solutions.
about-us.passionText: We dedicate ourselves with enthusiasm to every project.
about-us.communityText: We support and collaborate with clients and partners.
about-us.responsibilityText: We prioritize responsible and ethical practices.
about-us.growthText: We drive progress and continuous improvement.
about-us.philosophyText: We believe every interaction with our clients is an opportunity to create value and build trust.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our restaurant, dishes, and special moments through our images

home.aboutSubtitle: Learn more about our company and how we drive business success
home.aboutText1: We combine expertise and innovation to deliver high-quality solutions tailored to our clients' needs.
home.aboutText2: Our team works with dedication to provide exceptional services and results, focusing on every detail.
home.servicesSubtitle: Solutions designed to help your business grow
home.service1Text: We analyze your business and design strategies that drive growth and efficiency.
home.service2Text: We help build high-performing teams with the right skills and culture.
home.service3Text: We implement innovative technologies to solve complex challenges.
home.projectsSubtitle: Some of our most impactful projects and collaborations
home.contactSubtitle: Contact us to discuss your project or schedule a consultation

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of our most notable projects that showcase commitment, quality, and results.
projects.project1Text: Design and execution of a modern, functional, and sustainable workspace.
projects.project2Text: Development of a new visual identity to strengthen market presence.
projects.project3Text: Implementation of strategic improvements to increase efficiency and productivity.
projects.project4Text: Planning and execution of a comprehensive international communication strategy.
projects.project5Text: Creation of an engaging retail environment that enhances customer experience.
projects.project6Text: Development of responsible initiatives to reduce environmental impact and reinforce company values.
projects.cta: Contact us about your next project

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We create spaces that inspire and reflect your style. From design to execution, we offer complete solutions.
services.service1Text: We create personalized spaces that combine aesthetics, functionality, and comfort.
services.service2Text: We manage the entire renovation process to transform your home or business.
services.service3Text: We select materials, colors, and furniture to create unique environments.
services.service4Text: We provide professional design consulting for those seeking expert guidance.
services.service5Text: We coordinate every phase of the project, ensuring quality and timely delivery.
services.service6Text: We create realistic renders so you can visualize the final result before starting.
